desc: Be confident in shopping for window coverings with the no contact approach. Virtual Consults from Decorative Dreams Shop to your own Home. Visualize variety of Shutters, rollershades and valence options, black out shades to screen shades. View how shutters look on a patio door or even shutters on a bay window.

layout.text:
Due To The Covid-19, We Are Now Offering Virtual Design Consultations - Video Conferencing & Fabrics Delivered Right To Your Door!
We Are Also Offering Curbside Pick Up or Delivery.  No Need To Leave Your Vehicle. Just Text Or Call  905-691-0515  And Your Items Will Be Delivered Right To Your Car!
